titles.title: SBA Fraud Enforcement Extension Act
SBA Fraud Enforcement Extension Act
SBA Fraud Enforcement Extension Act
To extend the statute of limitations for fraud under certain pandemic programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 0.
Reported by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 119-226.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 184.

action.text: Mr. Williams (TX) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4495.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
